This is a demo showing how to use the load_interactive() method of ResourceLoader to load large scenes in the background with a progress bar.

Screenshots

This demo shows how to use autoloads to change between scenes.

export default class global extends godot.Node { goto_scene(path) { this.call_deferred("_deferred_goto_scene", path); } _deferred_goto_scene(path) { this.get_tree().get_current_scene().free(); let packed_scene = godot.ResourceLoader.load(path); let instanced_scene = packed_scene.instance(); this.get_tree().get_root().add_child(instanced_scene); this.get_tree().set_current_scene(instanced_scene); } }
